name: SC3 - Wireless Sensor Network Simulator
short_description:
This project aims to design a simulator which would allow to get a glimpse of power consumption of a WSN before actually deploying the network. 
The project consists of two parts: 
1. Signal Propagation Model
2. Communication Model (Protocol)
